rooms.title: Conference Room A
rooms.description: This conference room is located on the 2nd floor and can accommodate up to 12 people. It has a large table, comfortable chairs, a projector, and a whiteboard.

rooms.title: Meeting Room B
rooms.description: This meeting room is located on the 1st floor and can accommodate up to 6 people. It has a small table, comfortable chairs, and a whiteboard.

rooms.title: Training Room C
rooms.description: This training room is located on the 3rd floor and can accommodate up to 20 people. It has a large table, comfortable chairs, a projector, and a whiteboard.

rooms.title: Board Room D
rooms.description: This board room is located on the 4th floor and can accommodate up to 8 people. It has a large table, comfortable chairs, a video conferencing system, and a whiteboard.
